channel.title: Whonix gateway and whonix workstation
channel.description: When I open gateway it works fine it doesn’t freeze up my computer. But then I open gateway and workstation together and the whole computer freezes and I already fixed my RAM and shut off my background apps that’s running. I have a windows 10 computer. What do I do or what can be the problem or is it something else I can use instead of whonix.

item.title: Whonix gateway and whonix workstation
item.dc:creator: u896265715
item.description:
Install Whonix-Gateway CLI
as an option

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix gateway and whonix workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Seems pretty much like a too little RAM issue. You can try reduce both gateway and workstation RAM to 256 MB to start a terminal-only version. If that does not freeze, that would be further confirmation of a low RAM issue.

How much RAM does your host have?

Can you check how RAM fills up (live updating graph) as you start Whonix?

See also Low RAM Issues

Read full topic
